pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.description: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.description: The bulb on its back grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom.

pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.description: The flower on its back catches the sun's rays. The sunlight is then absorbed and used for energy.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.description: The flame at the tip of its tail makes a sound as it burns. You can only hear it in quiet places.

pokemon.name: Charmeleon
pokemon.description: Tough fights could excite this POKéMON. When excited, it may blow out bluish- white flames.

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.description: When expelling a blast of super hot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.description: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

pokemon.name: Wartortle
pokemon.description: When tapped, this POKéMON will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.

pokemon.name: Blastoise
pokemon.description: Once it takes aim at its enemy, it blasts out water with even more force than a fire hose.

pokemon.name: Caterpie
pokemon.description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

pokemon.name: Metapod
pokemon.description: Hardens its shell to protect itself. However, a large impact may cause it to pop out of its shell.

pokemon.name: Butterfree
pokemon.description: Its wings, covered with poisonous powders, repel water. This allows it to fly in the rain.

pokemon.name: Weedle
pokemon.description: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

pokemon.name: Kakuna
pokemon.description: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

pokemon.name: Beedrill
pokemon.description: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

pokemon.name: Pidgey
pokemon.description: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

pokemon.name: Pidgeotto
pokemon.description: This POKéMON is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

pokemon.name: Pidgeot
pokemon.description: This POKéMON flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

pokemon.name: Rattata
pokemon.description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

pokemon.name: Raticate
pokemon.description: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

pokemon.name: Spearow
pokemon.description: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.

pokemon.name: Fearow
pokemon.description: A POKéMON that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

pokemon.name: Ekans
pokemon.description: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

pokemon.name: Arbok
pokemon.description: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.description: It keeps its tail raised to monitor its surroundings. If you yank its tail, it will try to bite you.

pokemon.name: Raichu
pokemon.description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.

pokemon.name: Sandshrew
pokemon.description: Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.

pokemon.name: Sandslash
pokemon.description: It is skilled at slashing enemies with its claws. If broken, they start to grow back in a day.

pokemon.name: Nidoran-f
pokemon.description: A mild-mannered POKéMON that does not like to fight. Beware, its small horns secrete venom.

pokemon.name: Nidorina
pokemon.description: When resting deep in its burrow, its thorns always retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.

pokemon.name: Nidoqueen
pokemon.description: Tough scales cover the sturdy body of this POKéMON. It appears that the scales grow in cycles.

pokemon.name: Nidoran-m
pokemon.description: Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.

pokemon.name: Nidorino
pokemon.description: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

pokemon.name: Nidoking
pokemon.description: Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle. Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.

pokemon.name: Clefairy
pokemon.description: Adored for their cute looks and playfulness. They are thought to be rare, as they do not appear often.

pokemon.name: Clefable
pokemon.description: They appear to be very protective of their own world. It is a kind of fairy, rarely seen by people.

pokemon.name: Vulpix
pokemon.description: Both its fur and its tails are beautiful. As it grows, the tails split and form more tails.

pokemon.name: Ninetales
pokemon.description: According to an enduring legend, 9 noble saints were united and reincarnated as this POKéMON.

pokemon.name: Jigglypuff
pokemon.description: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.

pokemon.name: Wigglytuff
pokemon.description: Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.

pokemon.name: Zubat
pokemon.description: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

pokemon.name: Golbat
pokemon.description: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and suck blood.

pokemon.name: Oddish
pokemon.description: It may be mistaken for a clump of weeds. If you try to yank it out of the ground, it shrieks horribly.

pokemon.name: Gloom
pokemon.description: Smells incredibly foul! However, around 1 out of 1,000 people enjoy sniffing its nose- bending stink.

pokemon.name: Vileplume
pokemon.description: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

pokemon.name: Paras
pokemon.description: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

pokemon.name: Parasect
pokemon.description: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushrooms on its back. They appear to do all the thinking.

pokemon.name: Venonat
pokemon.description: Its large eyes act as radars. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.

pokemon.name: Venomoth
pokemon.description: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

pokemon.name: Diglett
pokemon.description: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

pokemon.name: Dugtrio
pokemon.description: A team of triplets that can burrow over 60 MPH. Due to this, some people think it's an earthquake.

pokemon.name: Meowth
pokemon.description: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

pokemon.name: Persian
pokemon.description: The gem in its forehead glows on its own! It walks with all the grace and elegance of a proud queen.

pokemon.name: Psyduck
pokemon.description: Always tormented by headaches. It uses psychic powers, but it is not known if it intends to do so.

pokemon.name: Golduck
pokemon.description: Its slim and long limbs end in broad flippers. They are used for swim­ ming gracefully in lakes.

pokemon.name: Mankey
pokemon.description: An agile POKéMON that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.

pokemon.name: Primeape
pokemon.description: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.

pokemon.name: Growlithe
pokemon.description: A POKéMON with a friendly nature. However, it will bark fiercely at anything invading its territory.

pokemon.name: Arcanine
pokemon.description: A legendary POKéMON in China. Many people are charmed by its grace and beauty while running.

pokemon.name: Poliwag
pokemon.description: The direction of the spiral on the belly differs by area. It is more adept at swimming than walking.

pokemon.name: Poliwhirl
pokemon.description: Under attack, it uses its belly  spiral to put the foe to sleep. It then makes its escape.

pokemon.name: Poliwrath
pokemon.description: Swims powerfully using all the muscles in its body. It can even overtake champion swimmers.

pokemon.name: Abra
pokemon.description: Sleeps 18 hours a day. If it senses danger, it will teleport itself to safety even as it sleeps.

pokemon.name: Kadabra
pokemon.description: Many odd things happen if this POKéMON is close by. For example, it makes clocks run backwards.

pokemon.name: Alakazam
pokemon.description: A POKéMON that can memorize anything. It never forgets what it learns-- that's why this POKéMON is smart.

pokemon.name: Machop
pokemon.description: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

pokemon.name: Machoke
pokemon.description: The belt around its waist holds back its energy. Without it, this POKéMON would be unstoppable.

pokemon.name: Machamp
pokemon.description: One arm alone can move mountains. Using all four arms, this POKéMON fires off awesome punches.

pokemon.name: Bellsprout
pokemon.description: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny insects with its vines and devours them.

pokemon.name: Weepinbell
pokemon.description: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is melted inside by strong acids.

pokemon.name: Victreebel
pokemon.description: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

pokemon.name: Tentacool
pokemon.description: It can sometimes be found all dry and shriveled up on a beach. Toss it back into the sea to revive it.

pokemon.name: Tentacruel
pokemon.description: Its 80 tentacles can stretch and contract freely. They wrap around prey and weaken it with poison.

pokemon.name: Geodude
pokemon.description: Commonly found near mountain trails, etc. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.

pokemon.name: Graveler
pokemon.description: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

pokemon.name: Golem
pokemon.description: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it's exposed to air.

pokemon.name: Ponyta
pokemon.description: Capable of jumping incredibly high. Its hooves and sturdy legs absorb the impact of a hard landing.

pokemon.name: Rapidash
pokemon.description: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

pokemon.name: Slowpoke
pokemon.description: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

pokemon.name: Slowbro
pokemon.description: Lives lazily by the sea. If the SHELLDER on its tail comes off, it becomes a SLOWPOKE again.

pokemon.name: Magnemite
pokemon.description: It is born with the ability to defy gravity. It floats in air on powerful electromagnetic waves.

pokemon.name: Magneton
pokemon.description: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6F degrees within 3,300 feet.

pokemon.name: Farfetchd
pokemon.description: Lives where reedy plants grow. They are rarely seen, so it's thought their numbers are decreasing.

pokemon.name: Doduo
pokemon.description: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this POKéMON runs at high speed on developed legs.

pokemon.name: Dodrio
pokemon.description: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

pokemon.name: Seel
pokemon.description: Loves freezing cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14F degrees.

pokemon.name: Dewgong
pokemon.description: Its entire body is a snowy-white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

pokemon.name: Grimer
pokemon.description: Made of hardened sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won't grow in its path.

pokemon.name: Muk
pokemon.description: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration, it lost its sense of smell.

pokemon.name: Shellder
pokemon.description: The shell can withstand any attack. However, when it is open, the tender body is exposed.

pokemon.name: Cloyster
pokemon.description: For protection, it uses its harder-than-diamonds shell. It also shoots spikes from the shell.

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.description: Said to appear in decrepit, deserted buildings. It has no real shape as it appears to be made of a gas.

pokemon.name: Haunter
pokemon.description: By licking, it saps the victim's life. It causes shaking that won't stop until the victim's demise.

pokemon.name: Gengar
pokemon.description: A GENGAR is close by if you feel a sudden chill. It may be trying to lay a curse on you.

pokemon.name: Onix
pokemon.description: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by DIGLETTs.

pokemon.name: Drowzee
pokemon.description: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it has eaten in the past.

pokemon.name: Hypno
pokemon.description: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

pokemon.name: Krabby
pokemon.description: Its pincers are superb weapons. They sometimes break off during battle, but they grow back fast.

pokemon.name: Kingler
pokemon.description: One claw grew massively and as hard as steel. It has 10,000-HP strength. However, it is too heavy.

pokemon.name: Voltorb
pokemon.description: It is said to camouflage itself as a POKé BALL. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.

pokemon.name: Electrode
pokemon.description: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.

pokemon.name: Exeggcute
pokemon.description: The heads attract each other and spin around. There must be 6 heads for it to maintain balance.

pokemon.name: Exeggutor
pokemon.description: Its cries are very noisy. This is because each of the 3 heads thinks about whatever it likes.

pokemon.name: Cubone
pokemon.description: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.

pokemon.name: Marowak
pokemon.description: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
pokemon.description: When kicking, the sole of its foot turns as hard as a diamond on impact and destroys its enemy.

pokemon.name: Hitmonchan
pokemon.description: Punches in corkscrew fashion. It can punch its way through a concrete wall in the same way as a drill.

pokemon.name: Lickitung
pokemon.description: Its tongue spans almost 7 feet and moves more freely than its forelegs. Its licks can cause paralysis.

pokemon.name: Koffing
pokemon.description: In hot places, its internal gases could expand and explode without any warning. Be very careful!

pokemon.name: Weezing
pokemon.description: It lives and grows by absorbing dust, germs and poison gases that are contained in toxic waste and garbage.

pokemon.name: Rhyhorn
pokemon.description: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.

pokemon.name: Rhydon
pokemon.description: Walks on its hind legs. Shows signs of intelligence. Its armor-like hide even repels molten lava.

pokemon.name: Chansey
pokemon.description: A gentle and kindhearted POKéMON that shares its nutritious eggs if it sees an injured POKéMON.

pokemon.name: Tangela
pokemon.description: Its identity is obscured by masses of thick, blue vines. The vines are said to never stop growing.

pokemon.name: Kangaskhan
pokemon.description: Raises its young in its belly pouch. Won't run from any fight to keep its young protected.

pokemon.name: Horsea
pokemon.description: If it senses any danger, it will vigorously spray water or a special type of ink from its mouth.

pokemon.name: Seadra
pokemon.description: Touching the back fin causes numbness. It hooks its tail to coral to stay in place while sleeping.

pokemon.name: Goldeen
pokemon.description: When it is time for them to lay eggs, they can be seen swimming up rivers and falls in large groups.

pokemon.name: Seaking
pokemon.description: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

pokemon.name: Staryu
pokemon.description: An enigmatic POKéMON that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

pokemon.name: Starmie
pokemon.description: The center section is named the core. People think it is communicating when it glows in 7 colors.

pokemon.name: Mr-mime
pokemon.description: Always practices its pantomime act. It makes enemies believe something exists that really doesn't.

pokemon.name: Scyther
pokemon.description: Leaps out of tall grass and slices prey with its scythes. The movement looks like that of a ninja.

pokemon.name: Jynx
pokemon.description: Appears to move to a rhythm of its own, as if it were dancing. It wiggles its hips as it walks.

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.description: If a major power outage occurs, it is certain that this POKéMON has eaten electricity at a power plant.

pokemon.name: Magmar
pokemon.description: Born in an active volcano. Its body is always cloaked in flames, so it looks like a big ball of fire.

pokemon.name: Pinsir
pokemon.description: Grips its prey in its pincers and squeezes hard! It can't move if it's cold, so it lives in warm places.

pokemon.name: Tauros
pokemon.description: A rowdy POKéMON with a lot of stamina. Once running, it won't stop until it hits something.

pokemon.name: Magikarp
pokemon.description: Famous for being very unreliable. It can be found swimming in seas, lakes, rivers and shallow puddles.

pokemon.name: Gyarados
pokemon.description: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

pokemon.name: Lapras
pokemon.description: A gentle soul that can read the minds of people. It can ferry people across the sea on its back.

pokemon.name: Ditto
pokemon.description: When it spots an enemy, its body transfigures into an almost perfect copy of its opponent.

pokemon.name: Eevee
pokemon.description: Its genetic code is unstable, so it could evolve in a variety of ways. There are only a few alive.

pokemon.name: Vaporeon
pokemon.description: Its cell structure is similar to water molecules. It will melt away and become invis­ ible in water.

pokemon.name: Jolteon
pokemon.description: A sensitive POKéMON that easily becomes sad or angry. Every time its mood changes, it charges power.

pokemon.name: Flareon
pokemon.description: It has a flame chamber inside its body. It inhales, then blows out fire that is over 3,000F degrees.

pokemon.name: Porygon
pokemon.description: The only POKéMON people anticipate can fly into space. None has managed the feat yet, however.

pokemon.name: Omanyte
pokemon.description: An ancient POKéMON that was recovered from a fossil. It swims by cleverly twisting its 10 tentacles about.

pokemon.name: Omastar
pokemon.description: Sharp beaks ring its mouth. Its shell was too big for it to move freely, so it became extinct.

pokemon.name: Kabuto
pokemon.description: A POKéMON that was recovered from a fossil. It uses the eyes on its back while hiding on the sea floor.

pokemon.name: Kabutops
pokemon.description: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

pokemon.name: Aerodactyl
pokemon.description: A ferocious, prehistoric POKéMON that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

pokemon.name: Snorlax
pokemon.description: Will eat anything, even if the food happens to be a little moldy. It never gets an upset stomach.

pokemon.name: Articuno
pokemon.description: A legendary bird POKéMON. It freezes water that is contained in winter air and makes it snow.

pokemon.name: Zapdos
pokemon.description: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: Moltres
pokemon.description: A legendary bird POKéMON. As it flaps its flaming wings, even the night sky will turn red.

pokemon.name: Dratini
pokemon.description: The existence of this mythical POKéMON was only recently confirmed by a fisherman who caught one.

pokemon.name: Dragonair
pokemon.description: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

pokemon.name: Dragonite
pokemon.description: It is said that this POKéMON lives somewhere in the sea and that it flies. However, it is only a rumor.

pokemon.name: Mewtwo
pokemon.description: Its DNA is almost the same as MEW's. However, its size and disposition are vastly different.

pokemon.name: Mew
pokemon.description: When viewed through a microscope, this POKéMON's short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.
